room_title: Escape room "Budapest Express" by Escapology St. Peters in St. Louis
review: Our family loves escape rooms and this one did not disappoint! We did the Budapest Express and with a few hints, escaped in 50 mins. The decor was very well done, the clues challenging, and the story line interesting! Our host was Zach who was very personable and helpful! We had a great experience! We canâ€™t wait till the next one!

room_title: Escape room "Budapest Express" by Escapology St. Peters in St. Louis
review: We did the Budapest Express room with a group of 3 and escaped with less than two minutes to spare. There was a great mix of interesting puzzles and the staff did a good job giving helpful clues. The only complaint I had is that there were a number of times where there was only one clue to work on, so at least one of us was just standing around. It would  have been even worse with more people.

room_title: Escape room "Budapest Express" by Escapology St. Peters in St. Louis
review: Zach was an awesome game master. Escaped the Budapest Express. Great time!
